author: Simon Difford
description: Fat-wash a bottle of peaty Scotch whisky with smoky bacon fat. POUR the now clarified smoky bacon-flavoured Scotch and other ingredients into mixing glass, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.
name: Fat Godfather
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Blended Scotch whisky (bacon fat washed)

recipeInstructions.text: Fat-wash a bottle of peaty Scotch whisky with smoky bacon fat
POUR the now clarified smoky bacon-flavoured Scotch and other ingredients into mixing glass, STIR with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
